citations.narrative:
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on21-JUL-17 at 1130 AM.
Stopped by the facility, no one with access to the records was available in order to conduct the inspection.
Discussed optimal hours of inspection with facility.
